src:
Aplicaţia zilei: SanDisk Connect Drive
03 Nov 2019, 22:00 by Ioana Nita

Nume: SanDisk Connect Drive


Platformă soft: Google Android, Apple iOS


Preţ: gratis


Dezvoltator: Western Digital Corporation or its affiliates

Funcţionalitate: aplicaţia le oferă utilizatorilor stickurilor de memorie SanDisk, varianta wireless, posibilitatea de a-şi  stoca pozele, clipurile video, muzica şi/sau documentele realizate pe smartphone sau tabletă direct pe stickul de memorie fără a fi necesar să îl conecteze fizic. Stickul de memorie connect wireless SanDisk poate fi în buzunar, geantă sau oriunde în apropiere, acesta comunicând wireless cu telefonul mobil, tableta sau PC-ul. Astfel, utilizatorii pot elibera spaţiu de stocare de pe smartphone sau tabletă, putând accesa oricând fişierele de pe stick, chiar şi fără conexiune la internet.
text:
Application of the day: SanDisk Connect Drive
03 Nov 2019, 22:00 by Ioana Nita

Name: SanDisk Connect Drive


Soft platform: Google Android, Apple iOS


Price: free


Developer: Western Digital Corporation or its affiliates

Functionality: The application offers users the SanDisk memory stick, the wireless version, the possibility to store their pictures, videos, music and / or documents made on the smartphone or tablet directly on the memory stick without having to physically connect it. The SanDisk wireless connect memory stick can be in your pocket, bag or anywhere nearby, wirelessly communicating with your mobile phone, tablet or PC. Thus, users can free up storage space on their smartphone or tablet, being able to access files on the stick at any time, even without an internet connection.
